specifically and unequivocally

criticized those groups today two days

allegedly killed by one of these racists

supremacist
and other hate groups that are repugnant

to everything we hold dear as Americans
now the President had to attempt this

do-over of a condemnation because the

Saturday he embraced the notion that
both the Nazis and those protesting the

Nazis were equally at fault we condemn
in the strongest possible terms this

egregious display of hatred bigotry and

the moral equivalence and refusal to

one person on a neo-nazi site really

and call this white supremacism this
white nationalism evil and let the

to do it today

it took another day and this afternoon

attacking in full force as is his want
among his targets the CEO a

what was his offense he stepped down

from the president's manufacturing

Council he will have more time to lower

than it is for him to criticize the Klan
is it easier for him to attack US

last shot at me are we living in Nazi
